userreviews.userReview: This is the epitome of a perfect historical romance.
Read this series out of order, but still enjoyable western. Hero was a little to gruff for me.
I enjoyed this so much.It had mystery, romance and tears.Looking forward to getting the continued story in "Last Chance"
As another GR review put it: "Not bad."I have the sequel (Last Chance) and I'm really looking forward to reading Lane's story.

description: Eva Eberhart was looking for way out of her dance hall life...and found herself at Trail's End. Gruff rancher Chase Cassidy didn't think Eva had what it took to be housekeeper to a bunch of ranch hands but he wanted to give her a chance. For Chase himself lived in the shadow of his own dangerous past.Maybe together they could find a place in the heart where they could build a sweet forgiving love. Because in Last Chance, Montana, the greatest chance of all comes along once in a lifetime.
title:
After All
      
          (Cassidy Men #1)
